name: YouTube Fluent by Nyan
description:
changes most stuff to be transparent and have a backdrop blur. 

IMPORTANT!

the Blur doesn't work in firefox, only in chromium based browsers and Safari since firefox doesn't provide support for Backdrop-Filter styles yet. You also have to use the dark youtube theme!


To work you need to activate the experimental web platform features flag under your chrome://flags settings and activate the dark youtube design.

1: type Chrome://flags into your adress bar
2: search for "experimental web platform features" and enable it
3: set your youtube to dark with youtube's design switch
additional_info:
1.6 added backdrop blur to the embedded videos and to the new mini player

1.5.3 added the backdrop blur to the "statistics for nerds" window.

1.5.2 added design to some other items

1.5.1 added the design improvements to the context menu in videos

1.5 fixed thumbnails, adjusted the rounded corners, added some design improvements

1.4 changed the search ui to a darker color to match the theme. font is now white, while the background is dark.

1.3: added the channel description endcard thing as a backdrop blur object.

1.2: added some hover effects and adjusted some background colors.

1.1.1: added the  in-video context menu as a backdrop blur object

1.1: added some in-video stuff, added a few hover effects, fixed an effect in the search box, 

1.0: Release Version
